pageProps.content:
# Pumpkin Scones

Makes 12

## Ingredients

* 1 egg
* 2 cups sr flour
* pinch salt
* 1Tb butter
* 2Tb sugar
* 1/4 cup milk
* 3/4 cup mashed pumpkin

## Method

1. cream butter and sugar, add egg and mix
2. fold in pumpkin
3. add flour + milk
4. kneed well
5. roll dough and cut to size
6. bake 180c 15-20mins

## Notes
